generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings extending into the distance, flanked by sidewalks and trees.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible along the right edge of the road, with pedestrians and bicycles parked nearby.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible on both sides of the street, including commercial and residential structures.
- vegetation: Trees are present along the road, lining both sides and casting shadows on the pavement.
- terrain: Grass and dirt patches are visible along the roadside, particularly in the median strip and near the curb.
- sky: The sky is visible above the buildings and trees, appearing overcast with a grayish tone.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- car: Several cars are visible on the road and parked along the sides, including a gray SUV in the middle of the road.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible hanging over the road, showing a green light.
- traffic sign: A blue parking sign is visible on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including those supporting traffic lights and signs.
- bicycle: A bicycle is parked on the sidewalk on the right side of the road.
- rider: A person is riding a bicycle on the left side of the road.
